name: Shangri-La Hotel, Vancouver

reviews.text: This hotel is not only beautifully appointed, but lives up to and exceeds the service expectations of its 5 star status. Staff were always pleasant and ensured that my needs were met at all times. The only negative feedback would be related to housekeeping timing, as one day our room was not serviced until 4-5pm. However, the room was always adequately cleaned and housekeeping was accommodating if the room was in use.
reviews.title: Excellent service, beautiful accommodations

reviews.text: Everything about this hotel is amazing from the moment you arrive (extending before opening your car doors)
reviews.title: BEST Hotel Experience in Vancouver By Far!!!

reviews.text: Stayed for two nights to celebrate a special birthday. The room had everything even extra toothbrushes and was gorgeous. We had 2 excellent breakfasts at the hotel's restaurant, Market by Jean Georges, The baked goods were exceptional, especially the croissants. The Spa was superb, but the front desk at the spa could have handled our situation a bit better. They told us to arrive earlier for a sauna/ steam prior to our treatment but we never received one.
reviews.title: Great place to pamper a loved one

reviews.text: Hotel, Rooms, Service and Spa were all excellent. In fact my wife said the massage and spa experience was the best she's ever had. The beds were top quality (Had a great sleep) and the breakfast at MARKET was excellent as well.
reviews.title: Excellent. Beautiful Hotel and Great Service

reviews.text: Couldn't have been a better stay! They have a great security system that gives you a safety factor unequaled to any place I have been. The staff is impeccably uniformed, always smiling and so helpful in every way. Housekeeping was always on time for the week I was there. Even though construction was underway outside the room, no sound came through when the balcony door was closed and it even provided interesting entertainment when sitting on the balcony.
reviews.title: Top Notch!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only negative thing I could say is that the sun didn't shine and the weather was miserable, but the hotel stay was superb!
reviews.title: A Fantastic Christmas Date Night!
Unsurpassed Perfection
reviews.text: My wife and I decided to have a night without the kids and do some Christmas shopping on Saturday and stay downtown at the Shangri-La. Our room was very nice for a 5 star hotel. We have stayed at most of the 5 star hotels in Vegas and this was just as good and a touch better. The room was very comfortable as well as the bed. Very nice bathroom with a separate large tub and shower. It was hard to leave, we could have easily spent 2 more nights. The location is perfect for walking distance to the best restaurants and shopping in Vancouver. We had the deluxe breakfast in the morning as it was included with our stay and it was delicious and the service was excellent. Our next date night will be here again and hopefully we can stretch it out to 2 nights!

The Shangri La Vancouver, was the perfect mix of opulence and comfort, with exemplary service standards and a superb menu on offer, I would rate it as one of the finest hotels that I have stayed at in recent times.

description: Sunlight filters in through the floor-to-ceiling windows, warming the latte tones and golden hues around you. Basking in complete ease, you contemplate your day ahead from the cosy comfort of your room at Shangri-La Hotel, Vancouver. Vancouver’s glittering city skyline against mountainous backdrops. As you tuck into a sumptuous breakfast, a sweeping view of the vibrant metropolis that is Vancouver unfolds before you. Settling into your tastefully furnished surroundings, you catch a glimpse of the majestic firs of Stanley Park in the distance. A leisurely stroll along the sapphire blue waters of its lakes would be heavenly. You decide on a short drive to Grouse Mountain. You’re in the right season for helicopter rides, and skiing and snowboarding off its slopes. The rush of height and speed proves refreshingly exhilarating. Nestled between the Coast Mountain Range and Pacific Ocean, there is certainly plenty to do in this urban oasis. You plan to take it a day at a time. For now, Shangri-La Hotel, Vancouver, beckons. You head straight for CHI, The Spa. A soothing organic British Columbia seaweed treatment indulges your well-worked body. Relaxation revives your appetite, and you find yourself at MARKET by Jean-Georges. Elegant contemporary interiors open your mind to the reinvented seasonal flavours conjured by Jean-Georges Vongerichten. You’re in for the best by this internationally-acclaimed Michelin three-star chef and entrepreneur. You’ve had a taste of the finest at this city. And it all began at Shangri-La Hotel, Vancouver.
